PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE 
	{ 	?s ?p ?o }
INSERT
	{ 	?s ?p ?literal }
WHERE
	{ 	?s ?p ?o .
		FILTER ( isLiteral(?o) && langMatches(lang(?o), ""))
		BIND ( STRLANG(?o, "en") as ?literal) .
		VALUES (?p) {
			(dcterms:title)
			(dcterms:abstract)
			(dcat:keyword)
		}
	}
